entry.title: [Global][Web Cloud - VOIP] Software Upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 4, 19:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jul 1, 14:56 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/07/2022 19:00 UTC
End time : 04/07/2022 20:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be a few minutes of interruption of CTI APIv2
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to make adjustments to our infrastructure.
